content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 56-63)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (14.5, 8.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (14.5, 8.0) (status: FULL_OUTPUT)
- Steam engine at (17.5, 8.5) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Small electric poles at (19.5, 9.5) and (17.5, 11.5)
- Partial water pipe connection from offshore pumps

### Secondary Boiler at position (14.5, 11.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (14.5, 11.0) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- No steam engine or proper connections

### New Boiler at position (0.5, -2.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (0.5, -2.0) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- No steam engine or proper connections

### Oil Processing Complex
Consists of:
- Oil refinery at (15.5, 15.5) (status: NO_POWER, recipe: BasicOilProcessing)
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) (status: NO_POWER)
- Partial pipe network for crude oil (status: EMPTY)
- Missing power connections throughout

### Chemical Plant Complex at position (6.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Chemical plant (status: NO_POWER, recipe: sulfur)
- Storage tank at (3.5, 12.5)
- Small electric poles at (8.5, 10.5), (8.5, 13.5), and (7.5, 14.5)
- Missing petroleum gas input and power

### Water Pipe Network
Consists of:
- Two offshore pumps at (-9.5, -0.5) and (-9.5, -2.5)
- Extensive pipe network with multiple pipe groups:
  - Working water pipes (status: FULL_OUTPUT) centered at (-8.5, -2.5)
  - Empty pipe sections (status: EMPTY) throughout the map

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Fluid Connection Issues
- Failed to connect offshore pumps to distant targets (positions: -9.5/-2.5 to 10.5/20.0)
- Attempted invalid pump-to-pump connections
- Verify maximum pipe distances and proper alignment
- Check for obstructions in pipe paths

### Placement Distance Problems
- Repeated pumpjack placement failures due to distance (17.5,40.5 vs player at 0,0)
- Move within 10 tiles before placing distant entities
- Implement distance checks before placement attempts

### Entity Existence Assumptions
- Attempted to access non-existent chemical plant at (6.5,12.5)
- Implement existence checks before entity retrieval
- Maintain updated inventory of placed entities

### Inventory Management Issues
- Attempted to place offshore pump when none were in inventory
- Verify item availability before placement attempts
- Track inventory levels for critical components

### Persistent Issues from Previous Report
- Placement on occupied tiles (still occurring)
- Boiler fuel insertion failures (still occurring)
- Power grid connectivity (still occurring)

### New Issues
- Offshore pump inventory depletion
- Implement inventory monitoring system
- Add production planning for critical components
